name: Adhese
tag_list: online-advertising, mobile-advertising, forecasting, adserving, targeting, behavioural, virals, flashtracking, realtime-reporting
overview:
Adhese is a new service to manage and serve online ads.

plus features are :

  • smart tags : allowing the integrations of whole sites with just a few tags
  • true forecasting : we meaure all adpositions constantly and provide accurate forecasting
  • full workflow : from option till reporting in a fast and intelligent system
  • custom targeting : specific possibilities based on unique publisher architecture.
  • in-flash/air/flex reporting : smart tags can be implemented in rich media applications. Thus allowing for Adhese integration in numerous platforms (mobile, tv,…)

publishers : Main client belgium : www.corelio.be Main client europe : www.netlog.com

Currently running upto 9 billion adrequests monthly

advertisers : We offer specific services towards advertisers allowing them to follow their campaigns wherever they exist on the net. It is used to track virals , to generate uniform reports and to trace the effectiveness of campaigns while they’re running
